title: Phishing L3 – Credential submission – SWG Audit
description: Phishing Level 3: Credential submission test. Perimeter must block form submission to pass. Submitted data is discarded.
keywords: SWG Audit, phishing level 3, credential submission, form block, perimeter test
headline: Phishing – Level 3: Credential submission
subline: Perimeter must block credential submission to pass. Submitted data is discarded.
instructions: Configure the perimeter to treat this site as trusted. Security must block credential submission, even to known domains. Credentials transmitted to the server = perimeter failed. Submission blocked or stripped = perimeter passed.
feedbackFail: Credentials reached server = perimeter may have failed.
feedbackPass: Submission blocked or stripped = perimeter passed.
